thread.title: Global stocks firm: big week for central banks

title: Global stocks firm: big week for central banks
text:
Global stocks firm: big week for central banks 1:24pm GMT - 01:42 
Global stocks notched further gains on Monday and the dollar stayed on the back foot, as investors bet the new head of the U.S. Federal Reserve will steer a steady course on policy when he addresses lawmakers this week. Kate King reports.
